citation.case_name: Legal Environmental Assistance Foundation, Inc. v. Environmental Protection Agency

html:
537 U.S. 989

LEGAL ENVIRONMENTAL ASSISTANCE FOUNDATION, INC.
v.
ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY ET AL.

No. 01-1846.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 21, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE ELEVENTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 11th Cir. Motion of American Petroleum Institute et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 276 F.3d 1253.
